title: file.changes Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing information about file changes and their status.

changes.description: If a change tracker is used, the number of changes across all files.

info.description: An object with a key for each Notefile that matched the request parameters, and value object with the `changes` and `total` for each file.

changes.description: The number of changes in this file.

total.description: The total number of Notes in this file.

pending.description: Set to `true` if this was a pending changes request and there are changes

total.description: The total of local Notes across all Notefiles. This includes Inbound Notes that have not been deleted, as well as outbound Notes that have yet to sync.

samples.title: Example Change Response
samples.description: Response showing changes detected in monitored files.
